name: tempo-root
description: Web framework alternative to React/Angular fully typed.

scripts.publish:npm: rush publish -a -b master -p -r https://registry.npmjs.org/ --include-all && npm run changelog:all
scripts.test:all: (cd core && npm run test) && (cd store && npm run test) && (cd dom && npm run test)
scripts.changelog:
run(){ mkdir -p docs/changelog; cp ./$1/CHANGELOG.md docs/changelog/$1.md; echo "---
title: $1
parent: Change Log
---
$(cat docs/changelog/$1.md)" > docs/changelog/$1.md; }; run
scripts.changelog:all: npm run changelog:core & npm run changelog:dom & npm run changelog:store & npm run changelog:paperjs
